name: Space Drifter (Fourth Eye)
description:
INTENDED FOR A GAME JAM BUT GAME DID'NT UPLOAD IN TIME SO DONT EXPECT ANYTHING GOOD. GAME CLOSES UPON DEATH. MIGHT CONTINUE DEVELOPMENT IF ANYONE PLAYS IT BECAUSE I HAD SOME GOOD IDEAS THAT I NEVER GOT TO ADD OR WERE REMOVED

Ship spins

Hold Left Mouse to accelerate forward (Tip: Don't hold it for too long)

Click then hold to shoot

Each shot pushes you backwards

Survive 10 waves

Pickup glowing energy orbs to recharge

Killing 3 enemies spawns an energy orb.

Red Arrow points towards the nearest enemy and Blue points to the nearest energy orb.
